logs.prompt: in the conta part you do not have to detect the columns as they are always the same. you have to keep in mind that you can recieve files in 2 formats: some that have the first row populated with the firsst 12 cells containing these values: data, ndp, explicatie, cont, cd, suma_d, suma_c, sold, validat, categorie, id_nota, fel_d, isred and the second type has the first row empty. in the type that thee first row empty you have to ignore everythingn that is in the first 10 rows, there are also groups of 7 rows that have to be ignored that start with an empty row and on the next row the first cell contains this value "Fisa contului" and also random empty rows. in the type of file that starts with an empty row you have to use all of the rows that have exactly 7 values inside of them and do not fit in the criterion of the rows that have to be ignored. in the type of file that starts with a row that has 12 values inside of it you have to ignore the last 4 columns. in the file type that starts with an empty row you have to add a new column "cont" between the 3rd and 4th column to match the format of the other type of file. you also have to keep in mind that after all of the files have the same format the date is always on the first column, account name is on the 4th column, suma_d on the 6th column and suma_c on the 7th column. modify the app according to all of this information
